name: Speed Demons (itch)
description:
Local 4 player game about trying to grab as much candy as you possibly can before the time is up. Each item has a different score value and the variety of the candy increases your score multiplier. 

This game was made in 48 hours for the 2018 Pizza Jam using unity.

Credits:

Programmers: Shea McAuley and Michael Kaplor.

Artists: Natalie Moursund and Alyxa Zerkel.
